com.tomtom.speedtools.tilemap

Class CachedTileMap<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomtom.speedtools.tilemap.TileMap<T>
      • com.tomtom.speedtools.tilemap.CachedTileMap<T>

  • public final class CachedTileMap<T>
extends TileMap<T>
    This class represents a cacheable map. It uses Google Guava for its (basic) caching. Use this class to avoid a huge load on the LBS system (and loads of network traffic) if you will be retrieving the same tiles over and over again. The cache is stored in the heap, so you may wish to set the VM '-Xmx700m' parameter (700m is an example; 700 megs of RAM).
